name: Shattered Souls
description:
Killing a target will sometimes shatter their soul, leaving a Soul Fragment behind for 20 sec.

The Soul Fragment will be consumed when you approach it, healing you for 1,805 health.

Consuming a Lesser Soul Fragment heals you for 6% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 1% of maximum health.

Consuming a Demon's soul will grant you 20% increased damage for 15 sec.
